AT.name: Dementium Remastered
AT.description: Von Grund auf neu gestaltet für den Nintendo 3DS™, nimmt Dementium Remastered all den Mut zusammen, der im preisgekrönten Spiel von Renegade Kid steckt und präsentiert ein neues und verbessertes atmosphärisches Survival-Horror-Erlebnis aus der First-Person-Perspektive mit optimierter Grafik, verfeinertem Gameplay, hochklassigem Sound und fesselnder Steuerung. Enthält neue Schwierigkeitseinstellungen, darunter der "Demented mode", der für Hardcore-Fans der Serie designt wurde! Dementium Remastered erzählt die Geschichte eines Mannes, der alleine in einem mysteriösen, verfallenen Krankenhaus erwacht, in dem die Zeit festgefroren scheint. Konfrontiert mit den tödlichen chirurgischen Experimenten, die die Säle durchwandern, einer Reihe herausfordernder Rätsel und absonderlichen Charakteren muss der Mann sich seinen schlimmsten Ängsten stellen, die Geheimnisse des Krankenhauses entschlüsseln und mit dem Leben davonkommen.

AU.name: Dementium Remastered
AU.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered takes the guts of Renegade Kid's award-winning title and delivers a new and improved atmospheric first-person survival horror experience with enhanced graphics, refined gameplay, high-quality audio, and immersive control options. Features new difficulty settings, including Demented mode - designed for hardcore fans of the series! Dementium Remastered tells the tale of a man who awakens to find himself alone in a mysterious, derelict hospital that is frozen in time. Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles, and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.

BG.name: Dementium Remastered
BG.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered takes the guts of Renegade Kid's award-winning title and delivers a new and improved atmospheric first-person survival horror experience with enhanced graphics, refined gameplay, high-quality audio, and immersive control options. Features new difficulty settings, including Demented mode - designed for hardcore fans of the series! Dementium Remastered tells the tale of a man who awakens to find himself alone in a mysterious, derelict hospital that is frozen in time. Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles, and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.

BE.name: Dementium Remastered
BE.description: Entièrement repensé pour mieux tirer avantage de la Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered reprend l'essence du titre récompensé de Renegade Kid pour aboutir à ce jeu de survival horror à la première personne innovant et atmosphérique, aux graphismes améliorés, au gameplay peaufiné, à la bande-son soignée et aux options de commandes immersives. Nouveaux niveaux de difficulté disponibles comme le mode Dément conçu spécialement pour les inconditionnels de la série ! Dementium Remastered retrace l'histoire d'un homme qui se réveille seul au beau milieu d'un mystérieux hôpital abandonné et figé dans le temps. Confronté à des monstres mortels qui errent dans les couloirs, à des énigmes complexes et à une multitude de personnages étranges, il devra faire face à ses plus grandes peurs, résoudre les mystères qui entourent l'hôpital et réussir à s'enfuir pour rester en vie.

Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles, and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.

ES.name: Dementium Remastered
ES.description: Reconstruido de abajo arriba para aprovechar la funcionalidad de la Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered retoma la esencia del aclamado título Renegade Kid y nos ofrece una experiencia de terror y supervivencia en primera persona con una atmósfera mejorada, mejores gráficos, una dinámica de juego refinada, sonido de alta calidad y unas opciones de control impresionantes. ¡Incluye nuevos ajustes de dificultad como el modo Demente, diseñado para los grandes fanáticos de esta franquicia! Dementium Remastered cuenta la historia de un hombre que despierta y se encuentra en un misterioso hospital abandonado que está congelado en le tiempo. Al enfrentarse a los grotescos y mortales experimentos quirúrgicos que recorren los pasillos, a una serie de desafiantes puzles y a un reparto de personajes peculiares, deberá enfrentarse a sus miedos más profundos, desvelar los misterios del hospital y escapar sano y salvo.

FI.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered takes the guts of Renegade Kid's award-winning title and delivers a new and improved atmospheric first-person survival horror experience with enhanced graphics, refined gameplay, high-quality audio, and immersive control options. Dementium Remastered tells the tale of a man who awakens to find himself alone in a mysterious, derelict hospital that is frozen in time. Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles, and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.

IT.name: Dementium Remastered
IT.description: Ricostruito da capo a piedi per sfruttare le potenzialità di Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered prende le basi del premiato titolo di Renegade Kid e vi offre un'esperienza di survival horror d'atmosfera nuova e migliorata con grafica migliore, giocabilità perfezionata, audio di alta qualità e opzioni di comando immersive. Le nuove impostazioni di difficoltà comprendono la modalità Demented, solo per i fan più hardcore della serie! Dementium Remastered racconta la storia di un uomo che si sveglia solo in un misterioso ospedale abbandonato e congelato nel tempo. Costretto ad affrontare i grotteschi e micidiali esperimenti chirurgici che vagano per i corridoi, una serie di complessi rompicapi e un cast di personaggi bizzarri, si troverà faccia a faccia con le sue paure più profonde, svelerà i misteri dell'ospedale e riuscirà a fuggire sano e salvo.

LT.name: Dementium Remastered
LT.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered takes the guts of Renegade Kid's award-winning title and delivers a new and improved atmospheric first-person survival horror experience with enhanced graphics, refined gameplay, high-quality audio, and immersive control options. MT.name: Dementium Remastered
MT.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered takes the guts of Renegade Kid's award-winning title and delivers a new and improved atmospheric first-person survival horror experience with enhanced graphics, refined gameplay, high-quality audio, and immersive control options. Dementium Remastered tells the tale of a man who awakens to find himself alone in a mysterious, derelict hospital that is frozen in time. Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles, and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.

NO.name: Dementium Remastered
NO.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered takes the guts of Renegade Kid's award-winning title and delivers a new and improved atmospheric first-person survival horror experience with enhanced graphics, refined gameplay, high-quality audio, and immersive control options. Features new difficulty settings, including Demented mode - designed for hardcore fans of the series! Dementium Remastered tells the tale of a man who awakens to find himself alone in a mysterious, derelict hospital that is frozen in time. Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles, and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.

NL.name: Dementium Remastered
NL.description: Dementium Remastered is vanaf de grond opnieuw opgebouwd om te kunnen profiteren van de Nintendo 3DS™. In Dementium Remastered wordt al het goede van de prijswinnende titel van Renegade Kid gebruikt voor een nieuwe, verbeterde survival horrorervaring die je beleeft vanuit de eerste persoon, compleet met verbeterde graphics, een verfijnde gameplay, hoogwaardige audio en een bediening die je meesleept in het spel. Met nieuwe moeilijkheidsinstellingen, inclusief de Demented modus - speciaal ontworpen voor hardcore fans van de serie! In Dementium Remastered wordt het verhaal verteld van een man die in zijn eentje ontwaakt in een mysterieus, verlaten ziekenhuis dat stil lijkt te staan in de tijd. De man, die wordt geconfronteerd met de dodelijke, grootse chirurgische experimenten die rondwaren in de gangen, een serie uitdagende puzzels en vele vreemde karakters, moet zijn hevigste angsten onder ogen zien, de mysteries van het ziekenhuis ontwaren en rennen voor zijn leven.

NZ.name: Dementium Remastered
NZ.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered takes the guts of Renegade Kid's award-winning title and delivers a new and improved atmospheric first-person survival horror experience with enhanced graphics, refined gameplay, high-quality audio, and immersive control options. Features new difficulty settings, including Demented mode - designed for hardcore fans of the series! Dementium Remastered tells the tale of a man who awakens to find himself alone in a mysterious, derelict hospital that is frozen in time. Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles, and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.

PL.name: Dementium Remastered
PL.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered takes the guts of Renegade Kid's award-winning title and delivers a new and improved atmospheric first-person survival horror experience with enhanced graphics, refined gameplay, high-quality audio, and immersive control options. Features new difficulty settings, including Demented mode - designed for hardcore fans of the series! Dementium Remastered tells the tale of a man who awakens to find himself alone in a mysterious, derelict hospital that is frozen in time. Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles, and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.

PT.name: Dementium Remastered
PT.description: Reconstruído do zero para usufruir da plataforma do Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered traz as entranhas do título premiado da Renegade Kid e oferece uma nova e melhorada experiência de terror de sobrevivência em primeira pessoa com gráficos aprimorados, jogabilidade refinada, áudio de alta qualidade e opções de controle envolventes. Com novas configurações de dificuldade, incluindo o modo Demented, desenvolvido para os fãs mais hardcores da série! Dementium Remastered conta a história de um homem que acorda em um misterioso hospital abandonado que parece ter parado no tempo. Confrontado pelos experimentos cirúrgicos grotescos que vagam pelos corredores, uma série de enigmas desafiantes e um elenco de personagens peculiares, ele terá que enfrentar seus medos mais profundos, desvendar os mistérios do hospital e escapar com vida.

RU.name: Dementium Remastered
RU.description: Заново переделанная под великолепные возможности Nintendo 3DS™, игра Dementium Remastered, основанная на давнем хите студии Renegade Kid, представляет собой новый улучшенный ужастик на выживание от первого лица с улучшенной графикой, утонченным геймплеем, высококачественным аудио и расширенными возможностями управления. С новыми настройками уровня игры, включая «безумный» режим, игра рассчитана на закаленных фанатов серии! Dementium Remastered повествует о человеке, очнувшемся в одиночестве в загадочном заброшенном госпитале, застывшем во времени. Сталкиваясь со смертоносными гротескными результатами хирургических экспериментов, блуждающими по коридорам, серией непростых головоломок и таинственными персонажами, он должен преодолеть глубочайшие страхи, раскрыть тайну и выбраться живым.

SE.name: Dementium Remastered
SE.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to take advantage of the Nintendo 3DS™, Dementium Remastered takes the guts of Renegade Kid's award-winning title and delivers a new and improved atmospheric first-person survival horror experience with enhanced graphics, refined gameplay, high-quality audio, and immersive control options. Features new difficulty settings, including Demented mode - designed for hardcore fans of the series! Dementium Remastered tells the tale of a man who awakens to find himself alone in a mysterious, derelict hospital that is frozen in time. Confronted by the deadly, grotesque surgical experiments that wander the halls, a series of challenging puzzles, and a cast of peculiar characters, he must face his deepest fears, unlock the mysteries of the hospital, and escape with his life.
